document_data.name: Gohar's Galloping Grog
document_data.creator: [[Gohar]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Gohar's Galloping Grog''' was an alcoholic drink brewed in the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Availability: Gohar's Galloping Grog was named after its creator â€“ [[Gohar]], the portly proprietor of the [[The Salty Dog]] tavern in the town of [[Targos]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1312}}. Gohar served his namesake specialty concoction to his guests for two [[gold]] pieces per customer.
